column1:
c
yclonic storm “Mocha”over the Southwest Bay of Bengal has intensified into a severe cyclonic
storm  and lay centered near 12.2°N and 88.0°E at 17.30 hours  today (11th May). It is very likely
to move northwards and gradually intensify into a very severe cyclonic storm by 12th May morning over
central Bay of Bengal. Thereafter, it is likely to recurve gradually, and move north-northeastwards with
further  intensification.  The  system  likely  to  cross  southeast  Bangladesh  and  north  Myanmar  coasts
